page.title: 09Interesting People
page.content: Mr Lawrenson came to the yputh hostel as a young boy and from that time he was determined to become the manager there. Sixteen years ago his ambition was realized. Now he and his family run the Hartington Hostel. Mr Gibson is vicar at Hartington. He likes village life and is very active in many village groups. He has journeyed far for his faith, to Israel and Canada taking members of the church with him. God called Mr Gibson to become a vicar, a calling which gives deep satisfaction through helping people. Paul Riley a local celebrity has risen throught the ranks to become a member of the English School F.A. He has played 5 times for his country in a midfield role. His ambition is to play for the England senior squad.
